name: Edict of Purifying Pacifism
flavor: You shed a righteous energy that punishes enemies who would harm you or your allies.

metadata.flavor: You shed a righteous energy that punishes enemies who would harm you or your allies.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, whenever a target makes a strike, they take holy damage equal to twice your Presence score. A target judged by you takes an extra 2d6 holy damage.
